languages.text: {n}Может показаться, что архетипических комиссаров с агитационных плакатов {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Имперской Гвардии{/g} рисовали именно с вашего собеседника. У него крупная волевая челюсть, глаза смотрят твердо и бесстрашно, небольшой шрам над бровью придает лицу суровый шарм. Мундир, хоть и поношенный, на совесть вычищен и заштопан, а череп на высокой фуражке отполирован.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Может показаться, что архетипических комиссаров с агитационных плакатов {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Имперской Гвардии{/g} рисовали именно с вашего собеседника. У него крупная волевая челюсть, глаза смотрят твердо и бесстрашно, небольшой шрам над бровью придает лицу суровый шарм. Мундир, хоть и поношенный, на совесть вычищен и заштопан, а череп на высокой фуражке отполирован.{/n}

languages.text: {n}One might think that the archetypical Commissars from {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g} propaganda posters are all life drawings of this man. He has a large and powerful jaw, his eyes are hard and fearless, and the small scar over his brow adds a certain rugged charm to his features. His coat, though worn, has been diligently cleaned and mended, and the skull on his tall cap has been polished to a shine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Может показаться, что архетипических комиссаров с агитационных плакатов {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Имперской Гвардии{/g} рисовали именно с вашего собеседника. У него крупная волевая челюсть, глаза смотрят твердо и бесстрашно, небольшой шрам над бровью придает лицу суровый шарм. Мундир, хоть и поношенный, на совесть вычищен и заштопан, а череп на высокой фуражке отполирован.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}One might think that the archetypical Commissars from {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g} propaganda posters are all life drawings of this man. He has a large and powerful jaw, his eyes are firm and fearless, and the small scar over his brow adds a certain rugged charm to his features. His coat, though worn, has been diligently cleaned and mended, and the skull on his tall cap looks well-polished.{/n}

{n}One might think that the archetypical Commissars from {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g} propaganda posters are all life drawings of this man. He has a large and powerful jaw, his eyes are firm and fearless, and the small scar over his brow adds a certain rugged charm to his features. His coat, though worn, has been diligently cleaned and mended, and the skull on his tall cap looks well-polished.{/n}

He has a large and powerful jaw, his eyes are hard and fearless, and the small scar over his brow adds a certain rugged charm to his features. His coat, though worn, has been diligently cleaned and mended, and the skull on his tall cap has been polished to a shine.{/n}

{n}One might think that the archetypical Commissars from {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g} propaganda posters are all life drawings of this man. He has a large and powerful jaw, his eyes are hard and fearless, and the small scar over his brow adds a certain rugged charm to his features. His coat, though worn, has been diligently cleaned and mended, and the skull on his tall cap has been polished to a shine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个人的长相，可能会让人以为{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国卫队{/g}宣传海报上典型的政委形象，都是以他为蓝本画出来的。他的下巴宽厚而有力，眼神硬朗而果决，眉毛上小小的疤痕为他的五官增添了粗犷的魅力。尽管他的大衣已经破旧，但却经过了相当细心的清洗与缝补，高帽上的骷髅印记也被擦得锃亮。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One might think that the archetypical Commissars from {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g} propaganda posters are all life drawings of this man. He has a large and powerful jaw, his eyes are hard and fearless, and the small scar over his brow adds a certain rugged charm to his features. His coat, though worn, has been diligently cleaned and mended, and the skull on his tall cap has been polished to a shine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个人的长相，可能会让人以为{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国卫队{/g}宣传海报上典型的政委形象，都是以他为蓝本画出来的。他的下巴宽厚而有力，眼神硬朗而果决，眉毛上小小的疤痕为他的五官增添了粗犷的魅力。尽管他的大衣已经破旧，但却经过了相当细心的清洗与缝补，高帽上的骷髅印记也被擦得锃亮。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}のプロパガンダポスターに載っているコミッサーは、この男をモデルにして描かれたのではないかと思うような風貌だ。力強い顎を持ち、目は視線をそらさず恐れ知らずで、眉毛の小さな傷痕が彼に無骨な魅力を与えている。身につけているコートは着古されているが、丁寧に洗濯と補修されているのが見て取れる。縦に長いキャップに施されているドクロは、光が当たるときらめくようにしっかりと磨かれている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One might think that the archetypical Commissars from {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g} propaganda posters are all life drawings of this man. He has a large and powerful jaw, his eyes are hard and fearless, and the small scar over his brow adds a certain rugged charm to his features. His coat, though worn, has been diligently cleaned and mended, and the skull on his tall cap has been polished to a shine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}のプロパガンダポスターに載っているコミッサーは、この男をモデルにして描かれたのではないかと思うような風貌だ。力強い顎を持ち、目は視線をそらさず恐れ知らずで、眉毛の小さな傷痕が彼に無骨な魅力を与えている。身につけているコートは着古されているが、丁寧に洗濯と補修されているのが見て取れる。縦に長いキャップに施されているドクロは、光が当たるときらめくようにしっかりと磨かれている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Podrías llegar a creer que los Comisarios arquetípicos de los carteles de propaganda de la {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Guardia Imperial{/g} son ilustraciones de este hombre. Tiene una mandíbula protuberante y poderosa, unos ojos duros e intrépidos y la pequeña cicatriz que tiene sobre la ceja le da cierto encanto masculino. Su abrigo, a pesar del desgaste, se ha limpiado y remendado con diligencia, y la calavera de su alto sombrero está pulida hasta relucir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One might think that the archetypical Commissars from {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g} propaganda posters are all life drawings of this man. He has a large and powerful jaw, his eyes are hard and fearless, and the small scar over his brow adds a certain rugged charm to his features. His coat, though worn, has been diligently cleaned and mended, and the skull on his tall cap has been polished to a shine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Podrías llegar a creer que los Comisarios arquetípicos de los carteles de propaganda de la {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Guardia Imperial{/g} son ilustraciones de este hombre. Tiene una mandíbula protuberante y poderosa, unos ojos duros e intrépidos y la pequeña cicatriz que tiene sobre la ceja le da cierto encanto masculino. Su abrigo, a pesar del desgaste, se ha limpiado y remendado con diligencia, y la calavera de su alto sombrero está pulida hasta relucir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}On pourrait croire que cet homme a servi de modèle aux affiches de propagande de la {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Garde Impériale{/g} représentant l'archétype des commissaires. La cicatrice qui lui barre un sourcil lui donne un certain charme brut, complété par une mâchoire carrée et un regard dur et plein d'audace. Son manteau, bien qu'usé, est régulièrement entretenu et le crâne qui orne sa casquette est parfaitement poli.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One might think that the archetypical Commissars from {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g} propaganda posters are all life drawings of this man. He has a large and powerful jaw, his eyes are hard and fearless, and the small scar over his brow adds a certain rugged charm to his features. His coat, though worn, has been diligently cleaned and mended, and the skull on his tall cap has been polished to a shine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}On pourrait croire que cet homme a servi de modèle aux affiches de propagande de la {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Garde Impériale{/g} représentant l'archétype des commissaires. La cicatrice qui lui barre un sourcil lui donne un certain charme brut, complété par une mâchoire carrée et un regard dur et plein d'audace. Son manteau, bien qu'usé, est régulièrement entretenu et le crâne qui orne sa casquette est parfaitement poli.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Man möchte fast glauben, bei dem typischen Kommissar von den Propagandaplakaten der {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperialen Armee{/g} habe dieser Mann Modell gestanden. Er hat einen großen, starken Unterkiefer, sein Blick ist hart und furchtlos, und die kleine Narbe über der Augenbraue verleiht ihm einen gewissen grobschlächtigen Charme. Sein Mantel ist zwar abgetragen, aber sorgfältig gepflegt und geflickt, und der Schädel auf seiner großen Mütze ist blitzblank poliert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One might think that the archetypical Commissars from {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g} propaganda posters are all life drawings of this man. He has a large and powerful jaw, his eyes are hard and fearless, and the small scar over his brow adds a certain rugged charm to his features. His coat, though worn, has been diligently cleaned and mended, and the skull on his tall cap has been polished to a shine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Man möchte fast glauben, bei dem typischen Kommissar von den Propagandaplakaten der {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperialen Armee{/g} habe dieser Mann Modell gestanden. Er hat einen großen, starken Unterkiefer, sein Blick ist hart und furchtlos, und die kleine Narbe über der Augenbraue verleiht ihm einen gewissen grobschlächtigen Charme. Sein Mantel ist zwar abgetragen, aber sorgfältig gepflegt und geflickt, und der Schädel auf seiner großen Mütze ist blitzblank poliert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}İmparatorluk Muhafızı{/g} propaganda afişlerinin bu adam esin alınarak hazırlandığını söyleseler kimse karşıt fikir belirtmez. Çenesi geniş ve güçlü, bakışları sert ve korkusuz, kaşının üstündeki küçük yara izi de yüzüne haşin bir hava katıyor. Paltosu eskimiş olsa da özenle temizlenmiş ve onarılmış, uzun şapkasındaki kafatasıysa cilalanarak parlatılmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One might think that the archetypical Commissars from {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g} propaganda posters are all life drawings of this man. He has a large and powerful jaw, his eyes are hard and fearless, and the small scar over his brow adds a certain rugged charm to his features. His coat, though worn, has been diligently cleaned and mended, and the skull on his tall cap has been polished to a shine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}İmparatorluk Muhafızı{/g} propaganda afişlerindeki arketip Komiserlerin, bu adamın çizimleri olduğunu söyleseler inandırıcı olurdu. Geniş ve güçlü bir çenesi var, bakışları sert ve korkusuz, kaşının üstündeki küçük yara izi de yüzüne haşin bir hava katıyor. Paltosu eskimiş olsa da özenle temizlenmiş ve onarılmış, uzun şapkasındaki kafatasıysa parlaması için cilalanmış.{/n}
